newsitem.title: USA: Medical Graphics signs CompuMedics deal.
newsitem.headline: Medical Graphics signs CompuMedics deal.

text.p: Medical Graphics Corp said Thursday it signed an original equipment manufacturer agreement with CompuMedics Pty Ltd under which it has the U.S. rights to relabel and distribute CompuMedics' sleep diagnostic products.

"This new technology is a logical extension of the MedGraphics product line, since sleep disorders often cause cardiorespiratory problems," Glenn Taylor, president and chief executive of Medical Graphics, said in a statement.
CompuMedics, based in Melbourne, Australia, specializes in computer-based medical equipment for monitoring and diagnosing patients.
Medical Graphics provides non-invasive cardiorespiratory diagnostic systems.
